channel.title: Telco Hub on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in Telco Hub on Validated Patterns

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Deploying the Telco hub pattern Prerequisites An OpenShift Container Platform 4.19 or later cluster with: cluster administrator privileges. compact 3-node cluster or standard cluster with at least 3 worker nodes.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Telco hub pattern configuration The Telco Hub pattern uses the following file hierarchy to control what runs in your hub.

item.title: Managing the Telco Hub pattern
item.description: Managing the Telco Hub pattern After the initial deployment, you can use the pattern.sh script and standard OpenShift Container Platform tools to manage, check, and troubleshoot the Telco Hub pattern.
